title: Widening and Reconstruction of Matara-Hakmana Road from 0 to 24.14 Km.
decision_details: - the Section of the road 0 to 2.0 Km. will be constructed to have a duel carriage way having four traffic lanes and the section from 2.0 km. 24.14 km. will have two lane carriageway. The work will be carried out by domestic contractors under total  cost of the project amounting to Rs.1,977,376,618.75 will be provided by local Banks.
